title: Couture Embroidery Sample, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic ribbon, glass beads
Technique: machine embroidered on velvet
description: Black velvet embroidered with flowering vines worked in gold thread and colored beads and scrolling bands made of ribbon around centers of colored glass.
